title: Pesawheel - React Spin and Win game
description: React spin the wheel game using react hooks, featuring animations. This app is server side rendered and interacts with a custom api using next js.

title: ACME Bank
description: Fullstack project using NodeJS and React to simulate a banking application. The app communicates with the backend API to retrieve user info, the user can make withdrawals, deposits & manage his multiple bank accounts.
